query:
UPDATE
                            capture_config
                        SET
                            server_id = $1,
                            last_server_ping = now(),
                            error = 'Connecting...'
                        WHERE
                            last_client_ping > NOW() - INTERVAL '10 seconds' AND
                            workspace_id = $2 AND
                            path = $3 AND
                            is_flow = $4 AND
                            trigger_kind = $5 AND
                            (last_server_ping IS NULL OR last_server_ping < now() - interval '15 seconds')
                        RETURNING true
